sides.title: Bomblet Generator
sides.ability: Bomb During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Bomblet with the [1 [Straight]] templete. At the start of the Activation Phase, you may spend 1 shield to recover 2 [Charge].

device.name: Bomblet
device.effect: At the end of the Activation Phase, this device detonates. When this device detonates, each ship at range 0-1 rolls 2 attack dice. Each ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage for each [Hit]/[Critical Hit] result.

sides.title: Conner Nets
sides.ability: Mine During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Conner Net using the [1 [Straight]] template. This card's [Charge] cannot be recovered.

device.name: Conner Net
device.effect: After a ship overlaps or moves through this device, it detonates. When this device detonates, the ship suffers 1 [Hit] damage and gains 3 ion tokens.

sides.title: Proton Bombs
sides.ability: Bomb During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Proton Bomb using the [1 [Straight]] template.

device.name: Proton Bomb
device.effect: At the end of the Activation Phase, this device detonates. When this device detonates, each ship at range 0-1 suffers 1 [Critical Hit] damage.

sides.title: Proximity Mines
sides.ability: Mine During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Proximity Mine using the [1 [Straight]] template. This card's [Charge] cannot be recovered.

device.name: Proximity Mine
device.effect: After a ship overlaps or moves through this device, it detonates. When this device detonates, that ship rolls 2 attack dice. That ship then suffers 1 [Hit] damage plus 1 [Hit]/[Critical Hit] damage for each matching result.

sides.title: Seismic Charges
sides.ability: Bomb During the System Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop a Seismic Charge with the [1 [Straight]] template.

device.name: Seismic Charge
device.effect: At the end of the Activation Phase, this device detonates. When this device detonates, choose 1 obstacle at range 0-1. Each ship at range 0-1 of the obstacle suffers 1 [Hit] damage. Then remove that obstacle.

sides.title: DRK-1 Probe Droids
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may spend 1 [Charge] to drop or launch 1 DRK-1 probe droid using a speed 3 template. This card's [Charge] cannopt be recovered.

device.name: DRK-1 Probe Droid
device.effect: While a friendly ship locks an object or jams an enemy ship, it may measure range from you. After an enemy ship overlaps you, that ship rolls 1 attack die. On a [Focus] result, you suffer 1 [Hit] damage. System Phase: At your initiative, you may relocate useing a [2 [Bank Left]], [2 [Straight]], or [2 [Bank Right]] template.
